alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 1:27PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ARCHES/GRAND FLAT AND TAVAPUTS PLATEAU COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 126 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was 15 miles east of Green River moving northeast at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This area of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Arches/Grand Flat and south central Tavaputs Plateau Counties. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 172 and 189. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 151 and 157. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
